DataElement.preferredName: Cytogenetic Analysis Complete Remission Confirmed Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Techniques for analysis of chromosomal and subchromosomal properties and structures, such as those to diagnose, classify, screen for, or manage genetic diseases and abnormalities._The disappearance of all signs of cancer in response to treatment.  This does not always mean the cancer has been cured._Confirmed; having been established or verified._Text term to signify an affirmative response, negative response, or indication that an event did not occur.

This does not always mean the cancer has been cured._Confirmed; having been established or verified.

Property.preferredDefinition: Confirmed; having been established or verified.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
